bibl.title: A first-century receipt from the receivers of public clothing in Tebtunis (P.Tebt.UC 1607c)
bibl.seg: Matt Gibbs & C. Michael Sampson, A First-Century Receipt from the Receivers of Public Clothing in Tebtunis (P.Tebt.UC 1607c).
Tebtunis, late first century CE. - The Supply and Purchase of Military Clothing in Egypt. - Physical and Palaeographical Description of P.Tebt.UC 1607c.
bibl.note: Tebtunis, late first century CE. - The Supply and Purchase of Military Clothing in Egypt. - Physical and Palaeographical Description of P.Tebt.UC 1607c.
